Most of the predictions are the same or very close to the values in the paper.         |

| mammalian1                | multi                | methylation             | 2023         | None             | anti_logp2                    | https://doi.org/10.1038/s43587-023-00462-6           | This is the DNAm age predictor from the paper in which there is no adjustment for species                                                                                                                   |
+---------------------------+----------------------+-------------------------+--------------+------------------+-------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mammalian2                | multi                | methylation             | 2023         | None             | anti_log_log                  | https://doi.org/10.1038/s43587-023-00462-6           | This is the relative DNAm age predictor from the paper, with min=0 and max=1                                                                                                                                |
+---------------------------+----------------------+-------------------------+--------------+------------------+-------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| mammalian3                | multi                | methylation             | 2023         | None             | None                          | https://doi.org/10.1038/s43587-023-00462-6           | This is the log-linear age predictor from the paper. To convert the units of DNAm age, then the age of puberty for the reverse transformation must be known for each species                                |
